definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several

sentences.english: Someone suggested to restrict the Net a few days ago and I agreed with it.
sentences.chinese: 前些時候有人建議對網絡加以限制，我很贊成。

sentences.english: Miss Lewis: Oh, hi Mike. I've been out of town the last few days. What did you need?
sentences.chinese: 噢，你好，麥克。我前些天不在城裏，你有什麼事嗎？

sentences.english: Children learn most during their first few years and they also absorb a huge amount of what they're taught in these years.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們的吸收性很強，特別在開始學習的前些年裏。

sentences.english: Someone saw them together a few days ago.
sentences.chinese: 有人前些天看見他們在一起。

sentences.english: Not many years ago, it was used to showcase India’s achievement to the outside world.
sentences.chinese: 前些年，這裏總是用來向外界展示印度的成就。

sentences.english: The Federal Republic back-pedalled on its earlier commitments.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦共和國從它前些時候作出的承諾退縮了。

sentences.english: Before policeman quality standard of whole some year whacker rises.
sentences.chinese: 整體的民警素質水平前些年有好大的提高。

sentences.english: If only two people pray, the leader should stand in front of the follower to the latter's left.
sentences.chinese: 若祗得二人禮拜，領拜者應站在跟隨者的左邊稍前些。

sentences.english: Meet a black uncle whom I photo the several days ago.
sentences.chinese: 居然碰見熟客了，那是前些天我拍的一個黑人大叔。

sentences.english: But for his first few weeks on this planet, we did not get along.
sentences.chinese: 而在他初來這顆星球的前些周，我們是處不來的。

sentences.english: A few days ago, she learned that his father got ill through the phone.
sentences.chinese: 前些天，她給家人打電話時，知道她的爸爸生了病。

sentences.english: One day she was here and vibrant and in an instant there was a different story to tell.
sentences.chinese: 前些天她還在這裏，充滿活力，眨眼間就物事人非。

sentences.english: Recently some people suggest imposing restriction on the internet, which I much agree.
sentences.chinese: 前些時候有人建議對網絡加以限制，我很贊成。

sentences.english: In previous years, we've told women that they were eating for two.
sentences.chinese: 在前些年，我們告訴孕期婦女她們要喫雙份。

sentences.english: That was certainly not common in previous years.
Your story calls to mind something similar which happened to me sometime.
sentences.chinese: 你講的情況使我想起前些時候我發生的一件類似的事。

definition: front part (of an object)/first part (of an event)/previous paragraph
by coincidence/it so happened that/fortunately/against expectation
truth to tell/to be quite honest...
time/auspicious time/time and date/long period of time/this day
